entry.title: [GRA][Webhosting] - Cluster 020 - Filerz49
entry.content:
Feb 15, 09:21 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved. --> End Time of the full backup : Mon 14th February 12:46 UTC

Feb 14, 12:58 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : 79% of the backup is realized. We will keep you updated on the progress.

Feb 9, 13:26 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : 33% of the backup is realized.
We will keep you updated on the progress.

Feb 8, 15:33 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : 23% of the backup is realized.
We will keep you updated on the progress.

Feb 7, 09:24 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : Our teams finished the raid resynchronization and are currently doing the full backup (6% of the backup is realized).
The full backup will take 2 weeks, we will keep you updated on the progress.

Feb 3, 11:17 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions :The raid resynchronization will be finished in around 4 days then we move on to a full which will take place for 2 weeks.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Feb 1, 05:33 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : Our teams are doing a reconstruction of the raid which may take several days.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Jan 31, 17:36 UTC
Update - UPDATE : The load is better. A backup is still ongoing, but there is a failing raid disk currently being repaired.
We apologize for any inconveniency caused.
